name: Shark Run
description:
Run in the vast ocean, avoid obstacles and collect shrimps on the way.

Mechanics:

Your points will increase as you run, collecting shrimps will give a multiplier bonus after certain thresholds. Getting the vacuum will suck the shrimps from all lanes for a short while.

Controls:

  • ← → - Change lanes.
  • ↑ - Jump.
  • ↓ - Cancel Jump.
  • Esc - Pause.

Main Character, go watch her
